- What is TwiPlay?

TwiPlay is an innovative Crypto game distribution and social platform based on Twitter. It serves as a traffic bridge from Web 2.0 to Web 3.0, offering a seamless Web3.0 experience to Twitter users through its Twitter super extension and creator-driven Crypto game center.

- TwiPlay provides four core features:

1. Twitter Super Extension: Enables users to publish supertweet to support extended features and content, download Twitter videos, share and directly use applications within tweets. It also offers exclusive Web3.0 benefits such as a dedicated Crypto information stream and one-click collecting airdrops.
2. AIGC Workshop: Allows users to easily build in-game characters, weapons, maps, and items using the AIGC engine. It supports custom payment systems, enabling the creation of unique games for their own communities.
3. ZK Match: Enables users to use their Twitter account as a Decentralized Identifier (DID) and link different blockchain wallets. It integrates social and blockchain data to generate Zk-reports and Fico-scores, facilitating quick matching with Web3.0 project incentives and tasks.
4. Twitter NFT Market: Supports users in promoting and selling NFTs on Twitter. Users can initiate Initial Game Offerings (IGO) based on templates, allowing other users to complete transactions directly within tweets.

______________________________________________

Learn more: https://twiplay.network
